# Dirtiest Ships (dirtiestships.com)

> An independent watchdog and real-time intelligence platform tracking high-emission maritime vessels and 2026 regulatory compliance risks.

## Purpose

This site provides structured data on vessel greenhouse gas (GHG) intensity, specifically focusing on Carbon Intensity Indicator (CII) ratings and financial risks under EU ETS and FuelEU Maritime regulations.

## Key Resources

- [Daily News](/news): Breaking news on vessel fines and regulatory shifts in the last 24 hours.
- [Vessel Rankings](/rankings): A searchable database of ships rated D or E by carbon intensity.
- [Compliance Tracker](/deadlines): Real-time countdowns and technical guides for the Jan 31 FuelEU deadline.
- [Methane Watch](/methane): Intelligence on methane slip and penalties for LNG-powered vessels.

## Data Schema

Each vessel profile includes:

- `IMO_Number`: Unique identifier.
- `CII_Rating`: Current operational carbon intensity grade (A-E).
- `FuelEU_Status`: Compliance estimate based on 2025 reporting data.
- `Last_Known_Port`: The most recent location of high-emission activity.
